data.name: Digestion of Strings, Numbers and Arrays
data.description:
(author note: this was republished in hoping of gaining attention)
We need to program our creature to be able to digest food! Make it so the digest() function returns the same given string but with a space between every single character. As the object is digested, all of the dangerous **Bacteria** (asterisks) must be removed from the word.

Here is a example of spacing out the words.

Example #1:
```python
digest("Burger")
```
should return:
```python
"B u r g e r"
```

The string given will not be restricted to only letters, and will also use numbers and arrays. The returned value MUST be a string.

Example #2:
```python
digest(1234567)
```
should return:
```python
"1 2 3 4 5 6 7"
```

Make sure any of the asterisks (`*`) are not returned in the returning string.

Example #3:
```python
digest("Ap*pl*e")
```
should return:
```python
"A p p l e"
```
